fact-2.value: Coats is the world’s leading industrial thread company. The pioneering history and innovative culture of Coats enable the delivery of its purpose to connect talent, textiles and technology to make a better and more sustainable world. We provide complementary and value-adding products, services and software solutions to the apparel and footwear industries.We also apply innovative techniques to develop high technology performance materials threads, yarns, fabrics and composites in areas like personal protection, telecoms, energy, transportation, and household and recreation.

fact-427.value: 4 Longwalk Road, Stockley Park, Uxbridge,UB11 1F E
